rules.rationale: Protects company from unlimited financial exposure

rules.rule: Termination notice period must be 90 days or less
rules.rationale: Maintains flexibility to exit unfavorable agreements

rules.rule: Payment terms should be Net 30-45 days
rules.rationale: Standard payment terms for cash flow management

rules.rule: Company must own all work product and deliverables
Confidentiality obligations must survive contract termination for at least 3 years
Mutual indemnification preferred; if one-sided, must include cap
Must comply with GDPR/CCPA standards if handling customer data
Auto-renewal clauses must require 60+ days notice to cancel
Governing law should be in company's jurisdiction when possible
